import React, { useState } from "react"; import Card from "react-bootstrap/Card" import Col from "react-bootstrap/Col" import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button" import deleteMyData from "../../api-functions/my-data/deleteMyData"; import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal" import Form from "react-bootstrap/From" import "../../css/PersonalDataCard.css" function UpdateModal(props) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return ( <> Update {props.header}
Data Attribute alert(1)} />
); } class PersonalDataCard extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) } render() { return ( <>
{ this.handleShow() }}> {this.props.header} {this.props.value} Self-Signed Cert
) } } export default PersonalDataCard
